scripts.ddb: npm run start-ddb && npm run wait-ddb && npm run init-ddb
scripts.wait-ddb: until nc -z localhost 8000; do sleep 1; done && echo "DynamoDB started"
scripts.init-ddb: aws dynamodb create-table --table-name wallets-sandbox --attribute-definitions AttributeName=code,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=code,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=5,WriteCapacityUnits=5 --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000
